aircraft.value: Kestrel Patrol - AC-5291-279 at Base Bravo

defect_observed.value: Wheel brake assembly seizure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 14/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 15/01/2025 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 19/01/2025 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 18/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 22/01/2025 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Wheel brake assembly seizure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
